topics.body: When I was like six or seven, we had this Russian Blue named Cloud. Named so because she looked like a rain cloud. And she was super pregnant. So my family and I were in the living room. Chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool. Watching some tv. My mom was watching some Soap Opera. I was just sitting there with Cloud in my lap. Petting her head while she gently purrs. The next thing I know, I hear this loud, blood-curdling scream. Cloud was starting to go into labor! ON MY LAP! I had to carry her to the box we'd prepared for her. After we got her in the box and comfortable, I was covered in blood and amniotic fluid. It was disgusting.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
